data.name: El apoyo ideal para el crecimiento de su negocio
data.value: The ideal support for the growth of your business

data.name: ::Introduccion
data.value: It is a new electronic meeting place that combines technology with the operations of Confirming (Payment Suppliers), Factoring and the purchase of invoices along with the incorporation of an auction process. The companies that provide products and services will be able to finance their working capital at very competitive rates, investors will find an investment instrument with very attractive rates and companies that demand products and services will be able to pay their accounts payable through our allied banks

data.name: ::Resumen caracteristica 1
data.value: High returns on your investment with low risk since you will have the confirmation of payment by a bank allied at the expiration of the invoice

data.name: ::Resumen caracteristica 2
data.value: Agile processes for the sale of your invoices without having to go to a financial institution, by auction, you will approve the discount rate offered more convenient for your company, provide you with working capital to boost your new sales

data.name: ::Resumen caracteristica 3
data.value: As a customer of our Allied Banks, you will have access to financial services and products for the cancellation of your accounts payable

data.name: ::Resumen servicio 1
data.value: If you are a client of our Allied Banks, through the system of Tufactoring you can channel the payment of your obligations with your suppliers by means of the acceptance of a Confirming service with or without financing.

data.name: ::Resumen servicio 2
data.value: Your invoices receivable to customers who are currently in the system of Tufactoring, you can authorize that they are published in online auction and receive from potential investors offers of purchases with different percentage of discounts.

data.name: ::Resumen servicio 3
data.value: The auction process will allow you to make invoice purchases without an investment limit, with the confidence of payment for the existence of an allied bank that will confirm that you will pay when the invoice expires. At the close of the day of the auction, the winner will be the one that offers the best offer of discounts to the seller.

data.name: textoPostular
data.value: Allows the assignment of the Invoices you wish to Confirm through the Bank of your choice.

data.name: textoEditingInvoice
data.value: Once the Invoices are uploaded manually or in bulk, you can edit and update the basic information or Deductions, before applying to the Confirming Banks.

data.name: textoSubTitleFinancing
data.value: Once each invoice has been confirmed by the Bank, you can Request or Cancel the Financing that will be applied at the time of your payment on the Expiration Date, taking into account the availability on the assigned Financing Line and the Expiration of the Invoice (3 days before).

data.name: textoAyudaRegistoEmpresa
data.value:
It allows the Registration of a Company in the “TuF@ctoring” System, in order to enjoy all the benefits of the Service of Sale and Management of Accounts Payable of the Invoices of its Suppliers, prior acceptance of Terms and Conditions.
Click here for more information.

data.name: textoAyudaRegistoInversionista
data.value:
It allows the Registration of an Investor in the “TuF@ctoring” System, in order to participate in the Auctions process, offering the discount for the Purchase of Invoices of your preference, prior acceptance of Terms and Conditions.
Click here for more information.

data.name: textoAyudaRegistoProveedor
data.value:
It allows the Registration of a Supplier in the “TuF@ctoring” System, in order to enjoy the Accounts Management Service Receivable from its Invoices to the different Customers, prior acceptance of Terms and Conditions.
Click here for more information.

data.name: textoAyudaLimiteCredito
data.value: Allows you to assign the Credit Line Amount to each Client, with which you can perform the different operations of your Accounts Payable through the Confirming Bank.

data.name: textoAyudaPerfil
data.value: "It allows the revision and updating of Company Data (Addresses, Telephone of Legal Representative, Contact Person and Bank Accounts).

data.name: textoAyudaPerfilBanco
data.value: Allows the review and update of Data of the Allied Bank (Addresses, Telephone of Legal Representative, Administrator and Bank Accounts).

data.name: textoAyudaPerfilInversionista
data.value: It allows the review and update of Investor Data (Addresses and Bank Accounts).

data.name: textoAyudaPerfilProveedor
data.value: It allows the review and update of Supplier Data (Addresses, Telephone of Legal Representative, Contact Person, Bank Accounts and Acceptance of Framework Contracts by Allied Bank).

data.name: textoAyudaSegmentar
data.value: It allows the assignment of an Account Executive to the different Profiles (Companies, Supplier and Investor), according to their existing classification or attention.

data.name: textoAyudaVerificarDatos
data.value: It allows to enter the result of the risk assessment, of the different Profiles (Companies, Supplier and Investor) that wish to have a relationship with the Bank as Confirming or simply to request an Account for the management of their operations.

data.value: Please select the corresponding Account Executive:

data.name: textContentConfirm
data.value: It allows to review and confirm the Invoices Postulated by the Client.

data.name: textContentBuy
data.value: Lets you review the Invoices Postulated by Customers (Confirming) or Suppliers (Direct Sale), you must remember that Direct Sales must be Offered, for the use of Confirming you must Offer or Release.

data.name: textoContentPublicarFacturas
data.value: It is composed of two Sections, in which you can perform different types of Actions on Invoices greater than 30 days, such as:

data.name: textoContentPublicarFacturas2
data.value: 1. Accept or Reject the different Offers sent by the Bank (Confirming Invoices or Direct Sale), with their respective Discount Percentage.

data.name: textoContentPublicarFacturas3
data.value: 2. Publish Invoices in the next Auction and Postpone Invoices at Expiration.

data.name: textoContentFacturasVencimiento
data.value: It contains the Invoices that will be paid to the Suppliers on the Expiration Date of each one, which are in this tray according to the following scenarios:

data.name: textoContentFacturasVencimiento2
data.value: 1. Invoices Confirmed by the Bank, with Expiration Date less than 30 days.

data.name: textoContentFacturasVencimiento3
data.value: 2. Invoices Postponed by the Supplier, with Expiration Date greater than or equal to 30 days. In the same way, these Invoices can be published to be sold in the Invoice Market.

data.name: textoMercadoFacturasProveedor
data.value: Detailed consultation of the Invoice Auction that is Active during the Remaining Time identified in the counter, located on the right side of the screen.

data.name: textoMercadoFacturasProveedor2
data.value: The information presented shows your Invoices offered and not offered by Investors

data.name: textoCierreMercadoProveedores
data.value: Shows the Best Discount Offers made by Investors.

data.name: textoCierreMercadoProveedores2
data.value: You have the Remaining Time of the counter, to Accept the Offer, otherwise they will return to the Publication tray for the next day.

data.name: textoMercadoFacturasFactor
data.value: It shows the Daily Auction that is Active, in which You can Bid the discount and review the calculations of the Invoices of your choice.

data.name: textoMercadoFacturasFactor2
data.value: The Auction will be open during the Remaining Time identified in the counter, located on the right side of the screen and each Invoice will be identified depending on whether it has been Bid or not, with a line on the left side and its color varies according to the following:

data.name: textoFinanciamientoInformation1
data.value: To change the Financing condition, perform one of the following actions, depending on the number of requests to be made:

data.name: textoFinanciamientoInformation2
data.value: 1. One (1) Invoice: Check the icon, located on the right side of the Invoice or select the Invoice and then check the icon in the detail window.

data.name: textoFinanciamientoInformation3
data.value: 2. All Invoices: Select the icon (⋮) from the Options menu, followed by the required Option: ✔ Request Financing or Cancel Financing.

data.name: textoFinanciamientoInformation4
data.value: Note: Each Invoice is identified according to whether or not it has Financing, with a line on the left side and its color varies according to the following:

data.name: textoPostularInformation1
data.value: To Post the Invoices, select the Confirming Bank and perform one of the following actions, depending on the number of Invoices to be assigned:

data.name: textoPostularInformation2
data.value: 1. One (1) Invoice: Check the Apply Button of the required Invoice.

data.name: textoPostularInformation3
data.value: 2. Multiple Invoices: Check the indicator of the required Invoices and then the Button + Apply (located on the right side of the Confirming Bank). Confirm the Application.

data.name: textoPostularInformation4
data.value: 3. All Invoices: Select the icon (⋮) from the Options menu, followed by the Options Select all and + Apply. Confirm the Application.

data.name: textoPostularInformation5
data.value: Note: To change the Financing condition of each Invoice, you must check the icon, located on the right side of it.

data.name: textInformationMassiveCharge2
data.value: again without saving the changes, select the option Clean in both sections (Invoices Processed and Unprocessed).

data.name: textoMensajeArchivoConciliar
data.value: Are you sure you process the file

data.name: ::Detalle servicio 1
data.value: You must register all the information requested by the Tufactoring system so that you have access to the terms and conditions of the contract that you must grant to the bank. Once authorized by the bank, the daily charge of your accounts payable will be automatically made to the Tufactoring system and the bank will be able to manage the notification and cancellation processes at the expiration of the outstanding obligations.

data.name: ::Detalle servicio 2
data.value: You can be invited by a customer through the system or enter directly to register all the information requested by the Tufactoring system. The approval by the allied bank is essential so that you can later access the electronic factoring contracts without recourse that you will grant to the investors that buy your invoices in the auction processes. In case you do not want to participate in the auction, the payment of your invoice will be received from the allied bank upon expiration of the invoice.

data.name: ::Detalle servicio 3
data.value: You must register all the information requested by the Tufactoring system so that you have access to the terms and conditions to operate. You must have an account in the banking system and once you have been authorized by our allied banks, you will have daily access to invoice auctions so that during the days you can bid on all the published invoices. If the purchase is awarded, you will receive a factoring contract without recourse granted by the seller and confirmation of payment upon expiration of the invoice. You can pay for the purchase by means of a payment button if your account is with the bank by allying or transferring if your account belongs to another institution.

data.name: Servicios subtitulo
data.value: Be part of the Tufactoring community through our services. Through the different mechanisms of this invoice market, companies will have the support of our allied banks to carry out payment management with or without financing their accounts payable, suppliers will be able to sell their invoices and investors can access the invoice auction and purchase at a discount. Sign up for Tufactoring and you will be able to find the financial mechanisms to successfully achieve your goals without complex procedures.

data.name: factorMarketBestOfferAnotherFactor
data.value: Best Offer made by another Investor.

data.name: indexTuFactoringAllParticipants
data.value: is a financing alternative where, through a contract, the Supplier transfers the future collection of the credits, obtaining in exchange the money immediately from those operations with a small discount. You can also wait for the Invoices to expire to collect them, always with the support of a

data.name: textHelpBankManagement
data.value: It allows the management of Activation and Deactivation of the different Banks for their participation as Allies in the System.

data.name: textHelpReconciledInvoices
data.value: It allows to make the Reconciled Payments to the Suppliers, corresponding to the Invoices Purchased by the Investors and paid via Bank Transfer from another Bank.

data.name: textHelpOverdueInvoices
data.value: It allows to make the Payments of the Invoices on their Expiration Date, to the different Suppliers that were waiting for this expiration and to the Investors with the reimbursement of the Net Value of the Purchased Invoices.

data.name: textSecureToPayment
data.value: Are you sure to make the Payment for an Amount to Pay of

data.name: textoAyudaConsultaPagosFacturasCompradas
data.value: Contains the Payments made by the Invoices Purchased from Suppliers, upon acceptance of the Offer (s).

data.name: textoAyudaConsultaPagosFacturasConciliadas
data.value: It contains the Payments made to the Suppliers after Reconciliation made by the TuF @ ctoring Operative, corresponding to the Invoices Bought by the Investors and paid via Bank Transfer from another Bank.

data.name: textoAyudaConsultaPagosFacturasVencidas
data.value: It contains the Payments made at the Maturity of the Invoices, according to the different scenarios: Suppliers who were waiting for the expiration of their Invoices and Investors who are reimbursed for the Net Value of the Invoices Purchased.

data.name: textoAyudaPerfilInversionistaPerson
data.value: It allows the review and update of Investor Data (Addresses and Bank Accounts).

data.name: textoAyudaPerfilOperativo
data.value: It allows the revision and update of Operative Data (Addresses, Telephone of Legal Representative, Contact Person and Bank Accounts).

data.name: textoAyudaPrincipalesEmpresas
data.value: It allows creating, accepting, rejecting, canceling, deactivating and consulting the Invitations received and sent to the different Clients, with whom you can participate in the System. Remember that to enter Direct Sales Invoices your Client must be registered in the System and you must wait and accept the respective invitation.

data.name: textoAyudaPrincipalesProveedores
data.value: It allows you to create, accept, cancel, deactivate and consult the Invitations received and sent to the different Providers, with which you can participate in the System.

data.name: textoAyudaRegistoBanco
data.value: Allows the Registration of an Allied Bank in the “TuFactoring” System, in order to participate as a Confirmer and Offer a discount on the Invoices of your choice or simply Release them for Publication in the Auctions, upon acceptance of Terms and Conditions.

data.name: textoMercadoFactorInformation1
data.value: To Offer the Invoices, do the following:

data.name: textoMercadoFactorInformation2
data.value: 1. Select the required Invoice, enter the Discount Percentage, review the calculations made of Profit, Annualized Profitability and Amount to Pay.

data.name: textoMercadoFactorInformation3
data.value: 2. Check the Bid button to submit your Offer.

data.name: textoMercadoFactorInformation4
data.value: When the Invoice Expires, you will receive the Net Value of the Invoice.

data.name: textInformationCesionFactor
data.value: Contains the Right Assignment Document of each Invoice purchased by the Investor.

data.name: textInformationQueryPaymentsFactor
data.value: Contains the Payments made for the Bids Received that Won in the Daily Auction, prior acceptance by the Suppliers.

data.name: textInformationBoughtInvoicesBank
data.value: Contains the Payments made by the Invoices Purchased from Suppliers, upon acceptance of the Offer(s).

data.name: textInformationReconciledInvoicesQueryBank
data.value: It contains the Payments made to the Suppliers after Reconciliation made by the TuF@ctoring Operative, corresponding to the Invoices Purchased by the Investors and paid via Bank Transfer from another Bank.

data.name: textInformationOverdueInvoicesBank
data.value: It contains the Payments made at the Maturity of the Invoices, according to the different scenarios: Suppliers that were awaiting the expiration of their Invoices and Investors who are reimbursed for the Net Value of the Invoices Purchased.

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation1
data.value: Once the Template is downloaded, follow the next steps to Load Invoices Massively:

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation2
data.value: 1. Enter the Template data and save the information in .txt format.

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation3
data.value: 2. Upload the .txt file to the System, through the "Upload Template" Button.

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation4
data.value: 3. At the bottom of the screen, the result of the extraction can be viewed, in the Sections Processed Invoices and Unprocessed Invoices.

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation5
data.value: 4. Review the information in the Unprocessed Invoices Section, make the corrections in your System, clean the section from the Options menu and reload the template.

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation6
data.value: 5. To complete the upload in the System, select the Save Invoices button, located at the top of the Processed Invoices Section.

data.name: textoEdicionFacturasInformation1
data.value: To modify Invoices, follow these steps:

data.name: textoEdicionFacturasInformation2.1
data.value: Section, select the Edit button of the required record.

data.name: textoEdicionFacturasInformation3.1
data.value: window will be shown, with the detail of the same, where you can make specific adjustments and add or modify Deductions, depending on the status of the Invoice. Finally press the Update Invoice Button, to save the changes.

data.name: textoEdicionFacturasInformation4
data.value: To delete Invoices, locate the required record in the

data.name: textoEdicionFacturasInformation4.1
data.value: Section, press the Delete Button and confirm the operation.

data.name: textFilterIsEmpty
data.value: There are no results for the Filter applied.

data.name: textInformationCesionBank
data.value: Contains the Right Transfer Document of each Invoice purchased by the Bank.

data.name: textInformationCesionProveedor
data.value: Contains the Right Transfer Document of each Invoice sold to the different Banks and Investors.

data.name: textoSeguridadInformation2
data.value: 1. To add a user, press the Invite button, indicate the name of the user, the email address with which you will enter the system, select the Role (s) according to the role to be performed and click on the Create button to save the information.

data.name: textoSeguridadInformation3
data.value: 2. The created User will be associated with the main Document Number of the Company and must Activate their User from the Welcome email, to start using the System.

data.name: textoSeguridadInformation5
data.value: 1. To modify a user's information, press the Edit button, make the necessary changes, and click the Update button to save the information.

data.name: textoSeguridadInformation7
data.value: 1. To accomplish this action, press the Lock or Unlock button and confirm the operation, clicking on the OK button.

data.name: textoSeguridadInformation8
data.value: Note: Blocked Users will not be able to enter the System.

data.name: textoCompraFacturas5

data.name: textoCompraFacturas0

data.name: textoMantenimientoCONFIRMANT
data.value: It allows the Security Administrator to control access to the System for each of the Users who will perform Bank functions, according to the assigned role and the permission of each one.

data.name: textoMantenimientoDEBTOR
data.value: It allows the Security Administrator to control access to the System of each of the Users who will perform functions within the Company, according to the assigned role and the permission of each one.

data.name: textoMantenimientoFACTOR
data.value: It allows the Security Administrator to control access to the System of each of the Users who will perform functions within the Investor's Company, according to the assigned role and the permission of each one.

data.name: textoMantenimientoSUPPLIER
data.value: It allows the Security Administrator to control access to the System for each of the Users who will perform functions within the Supplier's Company, according to the assigned role and the permission of each one.

data.name: textoConsultaFinanciamiento
data.value: It shows the Amount Allocated and Used of Financing for each Client, totaling by the Total to Pay and the Total Financed, with their respective detail of associated Invoices by Provider, Due Date, Net Value and Financing Indicator.

data.name: textoAyudaConsultaInvoiceBackoffice

data.name: textoAyudaMantenimientoSettings

data.name: textoAyudaMantenimientoAuction
data.value: It allows to Consult and Manage the Auction that will run automatically on a daily basis in the System.

data.name: textoAyudaModalConciliar1
data.value: - To Upload a Bank Transaction file:

data.name: textoAyudaModalConciliar10
data.value: - To authorize and release Non-Reconciled Movements:

data.name: textoAyudaModalConciliar12
data.value: Select the required record check, the Reconcile buttons in the Unconciled Transactions Section will be activated immediately.

data.name: textoAyudaModalConciliar14
data.value: Identify the Movement associated with the Payment to be released and click on the "Reconcile" button, a confirmation message will be immediately displayed with the Payments to be Reconciled, where you must Accept to release the record to the Payments to Reconcile tray of the Confirming Bank, as otherwise will remain pending.

data.name: textoAyudaModalConciliar16
data.value: 1. In the Section of the same name: Check the "Delete" button, a confirmation message will be displayed immediately, where you must Accept the Deletion, to delete the record.

data.name: textoAyudaModalConciliar19
data.value: Select the required record and check the "Reject" button to decline the Reconciliation of the reported Payment and Block the Investor.

data.name: textoAyudaModalConciliar3
data.value: Select the Bank Entity and the Type of Currency to which the Bank Transactions will be associated.

data.name: textoAyudaModalConciliar4
data.value: 2. Carry out the Upload of the .txt file in the System, marking the button “Upload File” and selecting the file with the Movements.

data.name: textoAyudaModalConciliar5
data.value: 3. Once the information has been updated, according to the result obtained between the comparison of the Bank Transactions and the Transfers reported by the Investor, the following will be carried out:

data.name: textoAyudaModalConciliar7
data.value: The record will not be displayed in the Reconcile Payments Section

data.name: textoAyudaModalConciliar9
data.value: The record will be displayed in the Non-Reconciled Transactions Section and will be maintained in the Reconcile Payments Section.

data.name: textoModalMovementNotConciliado
data.value: Are You Sure To Eliminate Unconciled Movement?

data.name: textoAyudaContabilidad
data.value: It allows to create and manage the Accounting Groups that will be associated with each Program (Factoring & Confirming) classified by Type of Currency in the System, for their subsequent assignment to Events and Concepts according to an Accounting Account and its Debit and Credit Category.

data.name: textoAyudaMantenimientoRoles
data.value: It allows the creation and management of Activation and Deactivation of the different Roles that are part of the Security of the Profiles in the System.

data.name: textoAyudaConsultaPagosOperativo
data.value: It contains all the Payments made in the System, corresponding to Invoices Purchased by Investors and Banks, Payments for Reconciliations or Payments at Maturity.

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation9
data.value: 1. Document Number, only the numbering with their respective hyphens (depends on the format of the Country)

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation10
data.value: 2. Invoice Number, with its respective hyphens (depends on the format of the Country)

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation12
data.value: 3. Currency Code, ISO 4217 code (depends on the Country - example: USD)

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation13
data.value: 4. Issue Date, in the format YYYY-MM-DD

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation14
data.value: 5. Expiration Date, in the format YYYY-MM-DD

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation15
data.value: 6. Net Value, with two (2) decimal places and with point (,) as decimal separator (9999.99)

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation17
data.value: - Each record is composed of the 6 values ​​indicated in the File Structure

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation18
data.value: - Each value will be separated by a slash (|)

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation22
data.value: The file name will have the following nomenclature

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation25
data.value: 1. Company corresponds to the name of the Company

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation26
data.value: 2. YYYYMMDD corresponds to the File Upload date

data.name: textoCargarFacturasInformation27
data.value: 3. MMM corresponds to the Currency Code (ISO 4217)

data.name: sureToRefused
data.value: Are you sure you want to reject the Invoice

data.name: textoAddNewInvoiceSupplier
data.value: It allows the Supplier to Load the Invoices of the different Clients, Manually or Massively, for their subsequent Direct Sale Application to the Confirming Banks.

data.name: textoEditionInvoiceSupplier
data.value: Once the Invoices are Manually or Massively Uploaded, you can edit them and update the basic information or Deductions, before being confirmed by your Clients.

data.name: textoPostularSupplier

data.name: textoModalRevisionTodas
data.value: Are you sure you accept all the selected invoices?

data.name: Fintech::Detalle servicio 1
data.value: Register all the requested information and accept the terms and conditions, once authorized you will receive your access code and you will be able to invite all your suppliers and enter the accounts receivable. Tufactoring will be in charge of notifying and with the debit authorization in account, invoices will be canceled upon expiration.

data.name: Fintech::Detalle servicio 2
data.value: Through the system you will receive confirmation of the invoices entered in the system by your clients and you can also make the sale request directly, so you can receive discount offers directly from Tufactoring or you can publish them in an electronic auction through our system and obtain offers from different investors.

data.name: Fintech::Detalle servicio 3
data.value: You must record all the information requested by the Tufactoring system so that you have access to the terms and conditions to operate. To have an account in the allied banks with which the suppliers also operate, and thus you will have daily access to the invoice auctions so that during the sessions you can bid on all the published invoices. If the purchase is awarded, you will receive a factoring contract without recourse granted by the seller and the payment confirmation upon expiration of the invoice. The payment of the purchase can be made through the payment button if your account is with the partner bank.

data.name: Fintech::Resumen caracteristica 1
data.value: Under the payment confirmation mechanisms between the companies and Tufactoring, you will receive the payment when the invoice is due.

data.name: Fintech::Resumen caracteristica 3
data.value: As a Tufactoring client, you will have access to all the services offered through its platform to manage the payment of your suppliers

data.name: Fintech::Resumen servicio 1
data.value: As our client, you can channel the payment of your accounts payable through our system by accepting a confirming contract.

data.name: Fintech::Resumen servicio 2
data.value: Register in the Tufactoring system and accept the invitation that your customers send you, you will receive confirmation of payment of your invoices and discount offers.

data.name: Fintech::Resumen servicio 3
data.value: The auction process will allow you to select the invoices that best suit your investment needs and expectations and whether you can make the discount offer. At the close of the auction day, if your bid was the winner, you will be notified to proceed with the payment.

data.name: Fintech::Servicios subtitulo
data.value: Become part of the Tufactoring community through our services. Through the different mechanisms, the companies will have the support to carry out the payment management of your accounts payable, the suppliers will be able to sell their invoices and the investors will access the invoice auction and make the purchase at a discount.

data.name: Resumen Contactanos
data.value: Give us a call or send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible!

data.name: indexSupplierTuFactoring
data.value: it is a financing alternative where through a contract the Supplier assigns the future collection of the credits, obtaining in exchange the money immediately from these operations with a small discount. You can also wait for the expiration of the Invoices to collect them, always with the confirmation of payment of your

data.name: indexConfirmantTuFactoring
data.value: it is a financing alternative where, through a Confirming contract, the Bank confirms the payment to Suppliers and Investors that carry out Factoring operations, allowing the Bank to have the first option to Purchase the Invoices.

data.name: indexDebtorTuFactoring
data.value: it is an alternative where your Suppliers can make the Sale of their Invoices to Financial Institutions or Investors, thanks to the Confirming Contract signed by you.

data.name: dashboardFactor
data.value: The Financial Institution, through TuF@ctoring, presents an investment alternative through which the Investor may offer discount percentages for the purchase on invoices published by the Suppliers. The recovery of the investment will be supported by a Confirming contract granted by the debtor Clients.

data.name: textoFacturasDisponiblesConfirming
data.value: Confirming for a Total Amount of:

data.name: textoFacturasDisponiblesDirecta
